full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Information Overview

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01023527
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Location of Work:** National Capital Region, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
* **Contracting Date:** January 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, at 14:00:00

#### Business Need Summary

The Department of National Defence is seeking the services of a Senior Procurement Specialist to support the Directorate Aerospace Equipment Program Management (M) 7. This position will provide specialized technical expertise in project management and procurement for critical resource management services.

#### Rationale

This requirement is the result of an extensive competitive process and is meant to provide suppliers with an on-going opportunity to become pre-qualified for participation in future bidding opportunities.

#### Tender Information

* **Method of Supply:** Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)
* **Number of Contracts:** One (1) contract for one (1) year, with a six-month irrevocable option period
* **Estimated Level of Effort:** 240 days for the initial contract period of one (1) year

#### Pre-Qualification Information

* This requirement is only open to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) with a valid registration.
* A list of pre-qualified suppliers has been made available at the following link: [www.buyandsell.gc.ca](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca)

#### Supplier Information Requirements

* **Notification of Interest:** Interested suppliers should submit their request for proposal (RFP) documents to the Department of National Defence's Bid Receiving and Invoice Address through the Government Electronic Tendering System at [www buyandsell.gc.ca](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca).

#### Governance and Administration

* This solicitation is subject to the policies and procedures established by the governance and administration of the Department of National Defence and in accordance with the requirements set out in the  Acb of the bid solicitation.

Note to contractors: please verify with the Department of National Defence all the solicited information in the Service Supply Trade Alliance home page and within the Canada Buy and Sell portal (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/fr/entreprises/vente-au-gouvernement-deservices/fournisseurs/. meilleure),
